award_title: CAREER: Unraveling flow-fluid coupling during impact of complex fluid droplets
subject: Making methods reusable (not just documented)
body:
Hi Xiaoyu,

You're working on droplet impact with suspensionsâ€”lots of imaging and flow analysis, I'd guess.

The problem we keep hearing: computational methods get written up in papers, but they don't really live on as tools others can actually use or build from.

Ouro helps researchers make their code and workflows discoverable and citable, so the accessibility and reuse that NSF cares about becomes something you can actually point to.

Would you be open to a quick call in January?

Hope you get some rest over the holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
